import React from 'react' import {Card,Col,Media,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {addToCart} from '../../Redux' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import './CartItemCard.css' function CartItemCard(props) { const cartItems= useSelector(state=>state.cart.items) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleAddToCart=(e)=>{ dispatch(addToCart(cartItems,props.product)) } return (
{props.product.name}

RS:{props.product.price}â‚¹/-

) } export default CartItemCard
